Author: Ghost#8941
Content: Should I update agama now or wait? Just download new version and run?

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: If you have this version you should be ok...but when the update takes effect we will release a new one

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Please download the latest version here is a link https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-wallets/ @Ghost  the one that you are using is a deprecated version 2.43d is the latest version.

Author: Ghost#8941
Content: Just download? Do I have to save anything?

Author: Ghost#8941
Content: I have my password and seed. I'm using lite. No wallet.dat for that right?

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: The update of the wallet  doesn‚Äôt affect the user data  and if you are using lite mode you won‚Äôt need to save the wallet.dat

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Even if you are using native mode updating the wallet won‚Äôt touch the userdata located in the %appdata% path ... it won‚Äôt touch the files contained in Komodo

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Let us know if you need any other help üòÉ
